root.name: NBA Hoopz
root.description: OverviewReleased for the Dreamcast, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Color, and PlayStation in 2001, this sequel to NBA Showtime: NBA on NBC altered the long-held Midway basketball format of a 2-on-2 game to 3-on-3. This was the final game in the "NBA Jam style" series of Midway titles. The next basketball game Midway released was the significantly different (although still "arcadey") NBA Ballers in 2004.
